summary: The document is a memorandum from November 12, 1965, detailing information about Federico PALMIERI Guillermo, a former CIA agent terminated in 1964. PALMIERI is currently in exile from Guatemala and employed in San Salvador. He is writing a book titled 'My Seven Years with CIA', which has attracted interest from a publisher in Mexico City. The memorandum also highlights PALMIERI's association with Roger RUSS, emphasizing the need to protect RUSS's identity in official files. References to other individuals and the location of the original memorandum in PALMIERI's file are also noted.
key_findings: Federico PALMIERI Guillermo was a CIA agent terminated in 1964.
PALMIERI is writing a book about his time with the CIA, titled 'My Seven Years with CIA'.
He is currently in exile from Guatemala and employed in San Salvador.
A publisher in Mexico City has shown interest in publishing his book.
PALMIERI had worked as a CIA agent for Roger RUSS, whose identity is to be protected in official files.
